frontmatter.description: Policy rate cuts have immediate yet nuanced effects on equities. Lower discount rates lift asset values, but if cuts reflect a weakening economy, earnings can soften. Ultimately, what matters is “why, by how much, and for how long” rates are cut. This post lays out the core mechanisms, historical co...
frontmatter.title: How Interest Rate Cuts Affect Stock Prices
